divs: sighting detailsmy encounter started off as a very normal,happy day. my girlfriend and i decided to take the two girls to the beach. we packed up the small grill,and food,and pop and caught the bus to the beach. we walked the rest of the way to montrose beach. the kids ran off to play after we made sure they had something to eat. we were talking and eating, having a good time. all of a sudden, i heard some one yell out excuse me sir, excuse me! i looked up and saw two individules standing about 75ft. from us attempting to speak to us. the little guy did't speak the whole time, his butler,or so i thought, did all the talking. the butler appeared english, and had a very heavy english accent. ilooked around and saw no one else was around. the butler said again, excuse me, sir , we happened to notice you brought your blanket, your cooler, and your grill, and food and seem to be having a holiday. i mistook them for couple of hungry tourists,trying to be mouching some lunch off us,and me, representing chgo., did my best to be extreamly polite and civilized towards them. the little guy appeared to be trying to blend in, but couldn't help but stand out. the butler kept trying to distract me,but i couldn't help sneaking off glances at the little guy,and the more i looked the more he kept tryingto distract me. i finally got in a good look, and saw him to be about chest high, with large eyes,with slit pulpils,and were half-closed. this trick was temperarally succesfull,but kept looking back and noticing more things the disguise couldn't hide! i remarked later to my girlfrend, he looked like some kind of eddie-munster looking alien. the butler complemented us, and again thinking i'm talking to couple of tourists starting braging about the chgo., and the great lakes. saying the great lakes contain 1\5 of the fresh water of the entire planet,and that lake michigan is 300 miles long and 60 miles wide, and that chgo. is poised to become the most importent city in the most powerful nation on this planet when global warming happens. i bragged about the the deep tunel project and also making the chgo. river run back wards to stop pollution. i snuck a look again back at the little guy,this time his pupiles were fully dialated and staring right at me! this really freaked me out, and i tryed to turn away but the butler again calmed me down,but i couldn't look at the little guy and soon broke contact. when i looked back they were gone! allmy girlfriend could say was why did i even talk to the little guy and i said i didn't i only talked to his butler and her reply was "i only saw the little guy" i told her we cant tell the cops and if we tell anyone else they'll think we're nuts! while we were having this conversation we heard a voice say, excuse me, excuse me! we both just froze,and dared not turn around!!!!!!!!!!! soon after the kids came back and we got the hell out of there!!!!!!!!!!!!!! my girlfriend moved out of state and i haven't seen her in over ten years. because of age and health i had to report this.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 20th 1994
